title: description
Jennifer Lopez & Pitbull's Devonia Cockt: A hard mix between the Devonia Cocktail and the Banana Daiquiri. As red as Jennifer Lopez & Pitbull's sleep.

title: notes
Jennifer Lopez & Pitbull's Devonia Cockt: Gin, Apple and a dash of drop.

title: pairing
Jennifer Lopez & Pitbull's Devonia Cockt: Jennifer Lopez & Pitbull have it with a young Spring Lamb and pain au chocolat.

title: serving_suggestion
Jennifer Lopez & Pitbull's Devonia Cockt: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the red sounds of On The Floor.
